org.bk.ass.bt

Class Repeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bk.ass.bt.TreeNode
      • org.bk.ass.bt.Decorator
        • org.bk.ass.bt.Repeat

  • public class Repeat
extends Decorator
    Repeatedly ticks a delegate node. If the delegate completes its operation, it will automatically be resetted and re-ticked.

    An internal Repeat.Policy is used to determine the status of the Repeat node based on the result of the delegate.

    Use Repeat.Policy.SEQUENCE to tick a delegate as long as it is succeeding. Use Repeat.Policy.SELECTOR to tick a delegate until it succeeds. Use Repeat.Policy.SELECTOR_INVERTED to tick a delegate until it fails.

      • Repeat

        public Repeat(Repeat.Policy policy,
              int limit,
              TreeNode delegate)
        Allows to configure a limit of repeats. After exhaustion, it will either succeed, if policy is SEQUENCE or fail if the policy is SELECTOR.
